body_html:
This is very cool! I don't think we want to add this to TF proper, since we have no way of maintaining it. @petewarden may disagree.

I would create your own repo to contain this. @ewilderj is there a place we can highlight such things?

I will close this PR for now.

body:
This is very cool! I don't think we want to add this to TF proper, since we have no way of maintaining it. @petewarden may disagree.

I would create your own repo to contain this. @ewilderj is there a place we can highlight such things?

I will close this PR for now.
